vdm_lustre:assume.vdm_lustre:name: Up/Down button signals are mutually exclusive

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: Setpoint increment
Setpoint decrement
Setpoint invariance
Cooling activation
Heating activation

vdm_lustre:assume.vdm_lustre:name: Up/Down button signals are mutually exclusive

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: Initial temperature is in range
Deadband and Diff are positive values
No activation signal is enabled if switch is in Off
Cooling system is turned On only if switch is in Cool
Heating system is turned On only if switch is in Heat
Activation signals are never enabled at the same time
Setpoint is always in range
Setpoint doesn't change if no button is pressed
Setpoint doesn't decrease if the up button is pressed
Setpoint doesn't increase if the down button is pressed
System is Off if current temperature is in the dead zone and system was Off in the previous step
Cooling system is On only if current temperature is higher than setpoint
Heating system is On only if current temperature is lower than setpoint
Cooling system is On if switch is in Cool and temperature is higher than setpoint plus deadband
Heating system is On if switch is in Heat and temperature is lower than setpoint minus deadband
Once cooling system is On, it remains On as long as setpoint hasn't reached and switch is in Cool
Once heating system is On, it remains On as long as setpoint hasn't reached and switch is in Heat

cyberReq.description: The thermostat shall be resilient to Control Temperature algorithm integrity
